meanings.definition: The number that is equal to the sum of ten and six.
meanings.sent1: I counted up to sixteen marbles in the jar.
meanings.sent2: There are sixteen students in our class.
meanings.sent3: Why did the sixteen chickens cross the road? To get to the other side!
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like sixteen candles on a birthday cake.
meanings.sent5: The clock struck sixteen, signaling the end of the school day.

meanings.definition: A group or set of sixteen people or things.
meanings.sent1: We need to split into four groups of four to make sixteen.
meanings.sent2: The football team consists of sixteen players.
meanings.sent3: The sixteen cookies on the plate disappeared in seconds.
meanings.sent4: His team of sixteen workers tackled the project with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with the laughter of sixteen children playing.
